alert.note: Alert for Ventura County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 18 at 12:08AM PST until December 18 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FOR THE OJAI VALLEY UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures between 28 and 32 are expected in the Ojai Valley portion. For the Wind Advisory, northeast winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Ventura County Interior Valleys. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM PST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, until 2 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. Extended exposure to cold can cause hypothermia for animals and people. Vehicle windshields will be frosted.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.
